name: I Came Here To Win
description:
Have you ever watched Top Chef, Project Runway, or your other favorite reality TV show, and wished you could channel that pure intensity at your gaming table?

Grab your cards, grab your dice, and get ready to play a season of whatever competition your heart desires! I Came Here To Win can be played by 1-8 people and requires no GM. 

Play intense, charismatic, skilled jerks of all kinds, appeal to the producers, and tell a story worthy of primetime!
